See also: Rauchen

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Old High German rouhhen.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [ˈʁaʊ̯xn̩], [ˈʁaʊ̯xən]
  • Audio
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

rauchen (third-person singular simple present raucht, past tense rauchte, past participle geraucht, auxiliary haben)

  1. to smoke
    Ich rauche nicht.
    I do not smoke.
